article_title: Garth Brooks to Launch Music Download Store
article_text:
Watch out, iTunes.

This week country-music icon Garth Brooks—who has long refused to allow any download store to sell his music—hopes to show the digital-music world how it’s done.

As the centerpiece of his new strategy, the 52-year-old singer is launching his own iTunes competitor: GhostTunes.

Mr. Brooks said in September that he...

twitter.description: Country performe Garth Brooks, who has long refused to let any download store sell his music, is launching GhostTunes, his own iTunes competitor, which will offer over 10 million digital songs by thousands of artists.
twitter.title: Garth Brooks Launches Download Store

image.alt: Garth Brooks to launch music  download store
